message_1:
Consider the following logical proposition: "If it is raining, then the streets will be wet." 

If it is not raining, what can we conclude about the state of the streets?

a) The streets are wet.
b) The streets are dry.
c) It is impossible to determine the state of the streets based on the information given.
d) None of the above.
message_2: c) It is impossible to determine the state of the streets based on the information given.
